articles.description: As Liverpool prepare for a new-look full-back pairing this season, BBC Sport look at the end of an era for Trent Alexander-Arnold and Andy Robertson.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold and Andy Robertson: End of one of the great full-back duos

articles.description: Australia lead by 82 runs with six wickets remaining after another thrilling day in the first Test against West Indies in Bridgetown.
articles.title: West Indies vs Australia: Hosts reduce Aussies to 92-4 in second innings of first Test

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo has signed a new two-year deal with Saudi Pro League club Al-Nassr.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo new contract: Portugal captain signs Al-Nassr deal until 2027

articles.description: The Club World Cup may have had a lukewarm reception in some parts, but Manchester City did their best to kindle interest with a statement victory over Juventus on Thursday.
articles.title: Club World Cup 2025: Man City lay down marker with hammering of Juventus

articles.description: Britain's Oliver Tarvet reaches the Wimbledon singles main draw - which will contain the highest number of home players for 41 years.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 qualifying: British world number 719 Oliver Tarvet reaches main draw

articles.description: Kenya's Faith Kipyegon fails in her attempt to become the first woman to run a sub-four-minute mile at Nike's 'Breaking4' event in Paris.
articles.title: Faith Kipyegon mile record attempt: Kenyan fails to become first woman to run sub-four-minute mile

articles.description: Lando Norris says he needs to stop making as many mistakes to ensure he has the best chance of winning the F1 drivers' title.
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix: Lando Norris says he needs to stop making as many mistakes

articles.description: Jofra Archer was like a "£100m signing" in 2019 but, after the heartache of persistent injuries, how will he fare on his Test comeback?
articles.title: Jofra Archer: How England bowler made his return to Test cricket

articles.description: Arsenal have opened talks with Spanish club Valencia as the Premier League club look to sign 20-year-old defender Cristhian Mosquera.
articles.title: Arsenal transfer news: Gunners in talks to sign Valencia defender Cristhian Mosquera
